name: HomedicsHome
0:
”Alexa, turn bedroom on”
”Alexa, turn bedroom off”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Breathe better with the Homedics Home skill for Amazon Alexa. Connected Homedics air purifiers are compatible with Amazon Alexa. Control your Homedics air purifier and monitor your indoor air quality with the Homedics Home skill. 

To get started, click “Enable” above and follow the instructions on the login page to link your Homedics air purifier to Amazon Alexa. You must have created a Homedics Home account and set up your Homedics air purifier in the Homedics Home app.

Ask Amazon Alexa to start or stop your Homedics air purifier or ask what the air quality is by saying:
“Alexa, turn bedroom on”
“Alexa, turn bedroom off”
[others…]

Homedics Home connected air purifiers:
C500
T200
T100 ("Zoie")
